terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.app
Class ImagePrinter

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.app.ImagePrinter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.print.Printable
public class ImagePrinter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.print.Printable

Provides image printing support. The image is printed when this object is constructed. The image will be sized to fit the print page and centered.

NO_SUCH_PAGE, PAGE_EXISTS

Specified by:
print in interface java.awt.print.Printable

buildPrintTransform

protected java.awt.geom.AffineTransform buildPrintTransform(java.awt.Image printImage,
                                                            java.awt.print.PageFormat pageFormat)
Builds the print image transform such that the specified image fits the page and is centered.

Parameters:
printImage - Image to be printed on the page.
pageFormat - Page format (i.e. page size and position).
Returns:
New transform for printing the image.
